headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Heist Wheels
content:
As part of the Heists update there is a wide array of brand new vehicles to spend your GTA$ on. The following are available right now:
- Dinka Enduro – a brand new off-road dirt-bike, will leave people eating your dust.
- Vapid Guardian – a menacing looking 4WD 4 seater behemoth that will strike fear into the hearts of your enemies.

And many, many, many more vehicles will unlock as you encounter them in Heists.
